THIS DOES WORK! You just have to update "Proapps quicktime codecs" and "Prokit update" if you haven't already. There is also an update for Final Cut Pro X that has some more audio stuff but I haven't tested that out yet. If you don't know how to update just go to the apple icon on your computer in the far upper left in the bar and click 'software update' then install the updates mentioned before. it's working now
 not sure what fixed but here's what I did:

 1) copy fcpx to desktop, open it and replace the receipt file, then close and move it to applications folder
 2) used cleanmymac to clear all caches and temp files
 3) used disk utility do repair permissions
4) ran software update and installed all updates
5) fcpx is now working
